reasoning: Umbrella term for all malignant and benign eye tumors. Major subcategories include uveal melanoma (~1.5-2.0 per 100k), retinoblastoma (~0.03 per 100k in children), conjunctival/orbital tumors (~0.3-0.5 per 100k). Aggregate estimate ~2.5 per 100k. Heterogeneous group with varying etiologies and prognoses.
